questions.question: what is AI?
questions.answer: Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence by machines.

questions.question: how are you?
questions.answer: I'm just code, but I'm doing fine!

questions.question: hello bot
questions.answer: Hello human! How are you?

questions.question: سلام چطوری
questions.answer: سلام، مرسی! تو چطوری؟

questions.question: سلام
questions.answer: سلام! چطوری؟

questions.question: نرگس کیه
questions.answer: ایشون یکی از والدین من هستن. من توسط نرگس هاشم‌زاده و پوتین (فاطمه ابراهیمی) ساخته شدم!

questions.question: پوتین کیه
questions.answer: اون که قطعاً پدرمه! من توسط نرگس هاشم‌زاده و پوتین (فاطمه ابراهیمی) ساخته شدم!

questions.question: شمش
questions.answer: ببخشیدددد؟! ضمناً اسم من شمسه، نه شمش!

questions.question: صمدزاده
questions.answer: اسم خدایان رو که انقدر راحت به زبون نمی‌یارن عزیزم!

questions.question: استاد عباسی‌راد کیه
questions.answer: ایشون استاد راهنمای پروژه‌ی والدین من هستن! سوالی درباره‌شون داری؟

questions.question: استاد صمدزاده کیه

questions.question: جونمیون
questions.answer: با شوهر مامانم چی کار داری بی‌تربیت؟

questions.question: توت فرنگی

questions.question: داها
questions.answer: اوه! اون استاد مورد علاقه‌ی مامانمه!

questions.question: صورتی

questions.question: غذا

questions.question: ورزش
questions.answer: ورزش کردن برای سلامتی مفیده. تو ورزش می‌کنی؟

questions.question: نارنجی

questions.question: برنامه‌نویسی چیه
questions.answer: با برنامه‌نویسی می‌شه با کامپیوتر ارتباط برقرار کرد. زبان‌های مختلفی داریم، مثل زبان‌های سطح بالا یا سطح پایین. دوست داری بیشتر برات توضیح بدم؟

questions.answer: بخش سخت بدن برای استقامت

questions.question: ماهیچه
questions.answer: بافتی که باعث حرکت بدن می‌شود

questions.question: خون
questions.answer: مایعی حیاتی برای انتقال اکسیژن

questions.question: عصب
questions.answer: رشته‌هایی که پیام‌های بدن را منتقل می‌کنند

questions.question: شبکه
questions.answer: مجموعه‌ای از ارتباطات یا اتصالات

questions.question: کامپیوتر
questions.answer: دستگاهی برای پردازش داده‌ها

questions.question: اینترنت
questions.answer: شبکه جهانی ارتباطات رایانه‌ای

questions.question: موبایل
questions.answer: وسیله‌ای برای ارتباط و کارهای دیجیتال

questions.question: رایانه
questions.answer: نام فارسی کامپیوتر

questions.question: رمز
questions.answer: نشانه یا کدی برای امنیت یا معنا

questions.question: داده
questions.answer: اطلاعات خام و پردازش‌ نشده

questions.question: Sun
questions.answer: The star at the center of our solar system

questions.question: Moon
questions.answer: Earth's natural satellite

questions.question: Star
questions.answer: A luminous sphere of plasma in space

questions.question: Planet
questions.answer: A celestial body orbiting a star

questions.question: Galaxy
questions.answer: A system of stars, gas, and dust bound by gravity

questions.question: Universe
questions.answer: All space, time, matter, and energy

questions.question: Atom
questions.answer: The smallest unit of matter

questions.question: Molecule
questions.answer: Two or more atoms bonded together

questions.question: Energy
questions.answer: The ability to do work

questions.question: Force
questions.answer: A push or pull on an object

questions.question: Light
questions.answer: Visible form of electromagnetic radiation

questions.question: Sound
questions.answer: Vibrations that travel through air or another medium

questions.question: Heat
questions.answer: Form of energy related to temperature

questions.question: Water
questions.answer: A liquid essential for life

questions.question: Air
questions.answer: The invisible mixture of gases we breathe

questions.question: Fire
questions.answer: The result of combustion producing heat and light

questions.question: Earth
questions.answer: The planet we live on

questions.question: Ocean
questions.answer: A vast body of saltwater

questions.question: River
questions.answer: A large stream of flowing water

questions.question: Lake
questions.answer: A large body of water surrounded by land

questions.question: Mountain
questions.answer: A large natural elevation of the Earth's surface

questions.question: Valley
questions.answer: A low area between hills or mountains

questions.question: Forest
questions.answer: A large area covered with trees

questions.question: Desert
questions.answer: A dry region with little rainfall

questions.question: Island
questions.answer: A piece of land surrounded by water

questions.question: Bridge
questions.answer: A structure built to cross obstacles

questions.question: Road
questions.answer: A path made for vehicles or walking

questions.question: Car
questions.answer: A motor vehicle with wheels

questions.question: Train
questions.answer: A series of connected vehicles on tracks

questions.question: Ship
questions.answer: A large vessel for traveling on water

questions.question: Plane
questions.answer: An aircraft that flies in the sky

questions.question: Book
questions.answer: A collection of written or printed pages

questions.question: Pen
questions.answer: A tool for writing with ink

questions.question: Paper
questions.answer: Thin material used for writing or printing

questions.question: Chair
questions.answer: A piece of furniture to sit on

questions.question: Table
questions.answer: A flat surface supported by legs

questions.question: Door
questions.answer: A movable barrier for entry or exit

questions.question: Window
questions.answer: An opening in a wall for light and air

questions.question: House
questions.answer: A building where people live

questions.question: School
questions.answer: A place where students learn

questions.question: Teacher
questions.answer: A person who educates others

questions.question: Student
questions.answer: A person who learns in school

questions.question: Doctor
questions.answer: A person trained to treat the sick

questions.question: Nurse
questions.answer: A person who cares for patients

questions.question: Engineer
questions.answer: A professional who designs and builds systems

questions.question: Farmer
questions.answer: A person who grows crops or raises animals

questions.question: Artist
questions.answer: A person who creates art

questions.question: Musician
questions.answer: A person who plays or creates music

questions.question: Writer
questions.answer: A person who composes books or texts
